```{r}
get.t <- function(dat, labs){
    # split the data into effective and ineffective
    effect <- dat[labs]
    ineffect <- dat[!labs]
    
    # calculate the two sample means
    effect.bar <- mean(effect)
    ineffect.bar <- mean(ineffect)
    
    # calculate the two sample variances
    v.effect <- var(effect)
    v.ineffect <- var(ineffect)
    
    # calculate the sample sizes
    n.effect <- length(effect)
    n.ineffect <- length(ineffect)
    
    # calculate the sd
    s <- sqrt((v.effect/n.effect) + (v.ineffect/n.ineffect))
    
    # calculate the test statistic
    T.value <- (effect.bar - ineffect.bar)/s
    return(abs(T.value))
}
```

```{r}
codes <- c("1006","1007","1008","1011","1014","1016","1019","1026","1032","1054","1060","1062")
resultmat = matrix(nrow=12,ncol=5)
rownames(resultmat) = c("1006","1007","1008","1011","1014","1016","1019","1026","1032","1054","1060","1062")
colnames(resultmat) = c("2","3","4","5","6")
```

```{r}
for (code in codes){
  print(code)
  gdsc_sub <- subset(gdsc, DRUG_ID_lib == code)[,c("CL","EFFECT")]
  gene_sub <- gene[as.character(gdsc_sub$CL),]
  gene_sub_full <- cbind(gene_sub, gdsc_sub['EFFECT'])
  filename = paste(c('train_',code,'.rds'),collapse='')
  fullname = paste(c(traindirect,filename),collapse='')
  cl_subset = paste(readRDS(fullname))
  gene_sub_full_train = gene_sub_full[cl_subset,]
  # outcome$T <- apply(gene_sub,2,get.t,gdsc_sub$EFFECT)
  n_features = c(2,3,4,5,6)
  for (n_feature in n_features){
    print(n_feature)
    accuracy_test_svm = c()
    for (j in 1:5){  
      set.seed(j)
      train_id=sample(1:nrow(gene_sub_full_train),0.8*nrow(gene_sub_full_train))
      train_gene = gene_sub_full_train[train_id,]
      test_gene = gene_sub_full_train[-train_id,]
      outcome$T <- apply(train_gene[,-ncol(train_gene)], 2, get.t, train_gene$EFFECT)
      subset_id = outcome %>% top_n(n_feature,T) %>% select(Gene)
      subset_id = unname(t(subset_id[,1]))
      train_gene_reduced = cbind(train_gene[,subset_id],train_gene['EFFECT'])
      test_gene_reduced = cbind(test_gene[,subset_id],test_gene['EFFECT'])
      train_gene_reduced$EFFECT <- as.factor(train_gene_reduced$EFFECT)
      test_gene_reduced$EFFECT <- as.factor(test_gene_reduced$EFFECT)
      tune.out = tune ( svm , EFFECT~., data = train_gene_reduced , 
                 ranges = list ( cost = c (0.01 , 0.1 , 1 ,10 ,100),gamma=c(0.01,0.1,1,10,100) ) )
      mysvm = svm(EFFECT~.,data=train_gene_reduced,kernel="radial",cost=tune.out$best.model$cost,gamma=tune.out$best.model$gamma,scale=FALSE)
            # training_pred = predict(mysvm,train_sub)
            # accuracy_train_svm[i] = mean(training_pred==train_sub[['EFFECT']])
      test_pred = predict(mysvm,test_gene_reduced)
      accuracy_test_svm[j] = mean(test_pred==test_gene_reduced[['EFFECT']])
  }
  resultmat[code,toString(n_feature)] = mean(accuracy_test_svm)
  }
}
```
